title: FC Zooveti
text: FC Zooveti Tbilisi () is a <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> club that is based in <a href="Tbilisi">Tbilisi</a>. In 2010–11 the club became champions of the <a href="Meore%20Liga">Georgian Meore Liga</a> and were automatically promoted to the <a href="Pirveli%20Liga">Georgian Pirveli Liga</a> championship, where they are currently playing.
